column4: Jrib vista will not install because it says partition is in ntfs format
i would appreciate help thank you
so windows channel is telling me to update my bios so i can reformat to ntfs
i tried to boot vista from cd it will not install on my partition because it is not ntfs format it will not let me reformat eithor
use fdisk to do the formatin or just clear out (delete)
basically i am trying to dual boot in the future and all i have right now is ubuntu on my pc
how would i delete a partition?
like in the windows setup process just delete a partition?
if you have clean boot yes
so i should run gparted to wipe clean a partition so i can reformat in windows setup?
well i need to clean remove removeable hardware so i can ntfs config in windows
